function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Association of poverty, morality, and disease, leading to discriminatory urban planning and design decisions.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of \\'surgical\\' and brutal slum clearance operations in response to contagious diseases outbreaks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focussing on three very different cities -jerusalem, phnom penh and torontothey reveal how histories of colonial occupation and planning, of postcolonial economic modernization and of entrepreneurial planning geared to promoting competitive global cities have produced conditions germane to the uneven spread and impacts of covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of health impacts in cities due to urban planning and interventions.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for urban planning to be divisive in interpretations of appropriate spatial interventions, exacerbating social inequality.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of transmission and spread of covid-19 and other pandemics in urban environments.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate public health infrastructure in the past","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 in crowded occupational environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Occupational exposure to coronavirus based on job tasks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workers at risk of exposure to sars-cov-2 in the workplace","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to eliminate covid-19 from the workplace","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness of control measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing the numbers of air exchanges","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Avoiding air recirculation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Air recirculation can transport infectious contaminants through spaces, leading to the re-entry of virus particles into workstations.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to close recirculation dampers can lead to the distribution of airborne contaminants from one point to others connected to the same system.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of induction units and fan coils with local circulation may lead to the resuspension of virus particles.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient outdoor airflow can contribute to the buildup of infectious contaminants in indoor spaces.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient social distancing among workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misconceptions about the effectiveness of hepa filters in capturing coronaviruses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited use of hepa filters in non-healthcare occupational settings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to increased risk of sars-cov-2 transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to maintain social distancing in small businesses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of physical barriers such as plexiglass, polycarbonate, and tempered glass in various industries and healthcare centers.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of administrative controls to minimize exposure to sars-cov-2 in workplace environments.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of personal protective equipment ppe to prevent the transmission of contagious diseases in workplace environments.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to use proper ppe","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper fit or seal of respirators","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on outdated guidelines for controlling covid-19 transmission in workplaces.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of expert team for the implementation of effective control measures in the workplace.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsanitary conditions in the built environment","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ventilation and air circulation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unidentified symbols and characters could indicate potential security risks or data corruption.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unidentified text content","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor ventilation and air circulation in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of surface hygiene and cleaning protocols","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing and overcrowding","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex and ambiguous text with potential security risk in encoded parts.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Text mentions the spread of contagious diseases in built environments at all scales.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious transmission of coronavirus from animal to human","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmentally mediated transmission of covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High occupant density facilitates the accrual of human-associated microorganisms","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased exposure risk associated with high occupant density and consistent contact demonstrated in covid-19 outbreaks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High transmissibility of covid-19 in confined spaces within the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resuspension of viral particles due to natural and mechanical airflow patterns in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transfer of viruses from individuals to surfaces and vice versa through contact","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination of fomites with sars-cov-2 particles from infected individuals and bodily secretions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survival of sars-cov-2 on different surfaces, indicating potential for fomite transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of sars-cov-2 through fecal-oral pathway","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
